title: Draft a Motion for Summary Judgment
description: A litigation associate needs to draft a motion for summary judgment, arguing that there are no genuine disputes of material fact.

tasks.description: Review the case file, including all pleadings, discovery responses, and deposition transcripts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all relevant factual evidence.

tasks.description: Research legal precedents supporting the argument for summary judgment in this jurisdiction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds 3-5 relevant case law examples.

tasks.description: Draft the motion, including a statement of undisputed facts, the legal argument citing the research, and a conclusion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a well-structured and persuasive legal brief.
